Detailed Description

Starts multiple "Gradient Ascent 1D" (GA1D) at various start points Combines two single GA1D problems together when they are near the same X value

Use Example: PralellGradientAscent1D pga(& [ParallelGradient1DConfig obj] ); pga.execute(); results = pgs.get_max_values();
